title.rendered: “IDF Takes Down Key Hezbollah Commanders in Strategic Counter-Terror Operations”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF eliminated a central commander of the Radwan force along with his deputy and another activist in the area of Lebanon yesterday.

During last night (D), a central commander of the Radwan force, Ali Mohammad al-Dibs, was eliminated along with his deputy, Hassan Ibrahim Aisa, and another activist.

Al-Dibs was among those involved in the attack at the Megiddo junction in March 2023. He led, planned, and carried out many terror activities against the State of Israel, especially during the war.

The elimination was carried out by an IDF fighter jet attack on a military structure of the Hezbollah terror organization in Nabatiyeh.

In recent hours, IDF fighter jets attacked a military structure of the Hezbollah terror organization in the Blida area. In addition, another military structure of the organization in the Maroun al-Ras area was attacked.

Attached is documentation of the attack on the military structure in the Maroun al-Ras area in recent hours: https://bit.ly/3SHJLIh
